meta.title: KORA Aerospace | Smallest Jetson Powered UAV
meta.description: We’re a 4-person UAV/autonomy research student team designing complete systems end-to-end: airframe, avionics, embedded, and autonomy.
meta.og_description: We’re a 4-person UAV/autonomy research student team designing complete systems end-to-end: airframe, avionics, embedded, and autonomy.
meta.twitter_description: We’re a 4-person UAV/autonomy research student team designing complete systems end-to-end: airframe, avionics, embedded, and autonomy.
hero.title: We build compact autonomous UAV systems with onboard AI.
hero.subtitle: We are a multidisciplinary student research team from METU and TU Delft, designing end-to-end autonomous systems: airframe, avionics, embedded, and autonomy.
what_we_do.title: What we do different
what_we_do.card_01.title: Competition as validation
what_we_do.card_01.body: We use competitions as a forcing function for reliability under constraints: limited time, limited budget, strict rules, real field conditions.
what_we_do.card_02.title: Hardware-first autonomy
what_we_do.card_02.body: We don’t treat autonomy as “just software” We integrate all: sensing, compute, power, EMI, mechanical integration, logging.
what_we_do.card_03.title: Accessible & Fast iteration
what_we_do.card_03.body: We use modular FDM printed components to iterate the design rapidly without adopting existing limitations or investing time into a composite frame.
competitions.title: Joining in 2026
competitions.subtitle: Our 2026 flight plan is built around events that stress-test autonomy, avionics, and reliability under real constraints.
competitions.card_01.title: SUAS 2026 (USA)
competitions.card_01.body: Autonomous search, target detection, and precision drop - focused on onboard perception and navigation.
competitions.card_02.title: Teknofest UAV 2026 (Turkey)
competitions.card_02.body: Mission-focused sensors with tight payload, comms, and endurance constraints across multiple sorties.
work.title: What we're working on
work.subtitle: We are currently focused on compact autonomy: flight testing, validating vision pipelines, and improving integration between avionics, power, and sensing.
work.focus_01.title: Modular flight platform
work.focus_01.body: Lightweight airframe with swappable and customizable mission modules.
work.focus_02.title: Edge vision stack
work.focus_02.body: Onboard detection and tracking tuned for constrained mobile GPUs.
work.focus_03.title: Custom-compact avionics
work.focus_03.body: Custom PCBs with power integrity, EMI control, and dense sensor I/O.
work.slide_01.label: Alpha_Flight Model
work.slide_02.label: Custom Avionics stack
work.slide_03.label: Modular frame development
work.slide_04.label: Custom avionics-compute PCB routing
work.slide_05.label: Flight
milestones.title: Milestones
milestones.subtitle: We’re building a platform step by step.
milestones.label: // NEAR_TERM_MILESTONES
milestones.item_01.title: Autonomy-ready avionics PCB
milestones.item_01.body: Power + compute + sensing integrated for compact form factors.
milestones.item_02.title: Perception + mission pipeline
milestones.item_02.body: Running fully onboard for real-time rapid decisions.
milestones.item_03.title: Airframe Flight validation
milestones.item_03.body: Consistent logging + repeatable test routes in field conditions.
milestones.item_04.title: Competition demonstration
milestones.item_04.body: Systems validated in multi-vehicle tests and finally demonstrated at SUAS and Teknofest.
sponsorship_enables.title: What sponsorship directly enables
sponsorship_enables.item_04: Batteries, RF/telemetry gear, and test equipment
sponsorship_enables.item_05: Field testing logistics and competition travel
team.label: // Members
team.title: Our Team
team.subtitle: We are a compact team of multidisciplinary specialists who love working on complex problems.
team.member_01.name: Yiğit Kılıçarslan
team.member_01.bio: Specializes in PCB and firmware development. Freelances as a full-stack hardware dev.
team.member_02.name: Ceren Eren
team.member_02.bio: Specializes in aerodynamic structural design and rapid physical prototyping. Leads the end-to-end assembly process.
team.member_03.name: Evren Uçar
team.member_03.bio: Focused on integration of airframe, electrical and software. Works as a design engineer offering full-stack product development.
team.member_04.name: Nursena Gürlek
team.member_04.bio: Experienced in computational aerodynamic analysis and flight control software.
track_record.title: Track record
track_record.entry_01.title: BEKO "Hack the Normal" Global Hackathon
track_record.entry_01.body: Developed novel cleaning solution and demonstrated its viability.
track_record.entry_02.title: Baku Smart Karabakh Hackathon, Teknofest
track_record.entry_02.body: Developed a agricultural VTOL and the infrastructure to support operations with wide coverage.
track_record.entry_03.title: Teknofest "Ulasimda Yapay Zeka"
track_record.entry_03.body: Utilized self trained vision models to detect and classify vehicles from drone images.
track_record.entry_04.title: European Rover Challenge
track_record.entry_04.body: Kielce, Poland. Recognized for rigorous engineering and scientific methodology.
track_record.media_01.label: TEKNOFEST 2021
track_record.media_02.label: Sina VTOL system
track_record.media_03.label: BEKO Hackhathon & startup-accerelator

sponsors.benefits.title: What our sponsors get
sponsors.benefits.label: // SUPPORT OUR PROGRESS
sponsors.benefits.item_01.title: Visibility
sponsors.benefits.item_01.body: Logo on vehicle, website, posters, and demo content.
sponsors.benefits.item_02.title: Technical Consulting
sponsors.benefits.item_02.body: We'd love to chat about your projects. You can reach us anytime.
sponsors.benefits.item_03.title: R&D TRANSPARENCY
sponsors.benefits.item_03.body: Periodic progress updates, test results summary of hardware developed.
sponsors.benefits.item_04.title: Demos
sponsors.benefits.item_04.body: Sponsor showcase flight/test session when feasible.
sponsors.current.title: Current Sponsors
get_involved.title: Get involved
get_involved.subtitle: If you’re a company or a lab that wants to accelerate autonomous UAV development, there are three ways to help:
get_involved.option_01.title: Sponsor hardware-software development
get_involved.option_02.title: Provide equipment or fabrication support
get_involved.option_02.body: PCB assembly, manufacturing, materials, sensors, compute
get_involved.option_03.title: Enable testing
get_involved.option_03.body: safe test site access, field conditions, mentorship
get_involved.cta: Fill in our interest form to schedule a meeting
get_involved.quote: "For us to move as fast we need funds, fabrication and field access. We partner with labs and manufacturers who want to see their technologies validated or just want to support our progress"
